title: 牌子玩出新花样(出来坑坑新)
author: RAY5DHao
txt_content:
本帖最后由 卅个屮 于 2014-6-10 13:56 编辑 

http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNzI0MTAwODM2.html
话说昨天看到@Koke_Cacao的帖子http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-282521-1-1.html
突发奇想......
效果:一个牌子转啊转
原理:16个命令方块进行循环
每个命令方块的指令如下:
一个牌子转啊转
原理:16个命令方块进行循环
每个命令方块的指令如下:

/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 0 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 1 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 2 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 3 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 4 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 5 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 6 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 7 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 8 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 9 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 10 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 11 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 12 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 13 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 14 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码
/setblock 0 64 0 minecraft:standing_sign 15 replace {Text2:"[[[[[]]]]]",Text3:"[[[[[]]]]]"}复制代码


每条指令唯一的不同点就是replace前面那个数字,那叫附加值,用来记录牌子的方向

存档下载:http://pan.baidu.com/s/1c0iXLlu(兼容MC1.7及以上)
以后还可能发布类似的帖子:蛋疼红石小玩意系列......
不喜勿喷

replies.txt_content: 顶啊顶啊，表示本人红石小白····

replies.txt_content: replace 不能替换正id相同的方块

replies.author: Creeper娘控
replies.txt_content: 这是好方法啊！可以做高科技用

replies.txt_content: 好吧，表示新手没看明白。

replies.author: 爱着杨海燕
replies.txt_content: 这牌子玩的。。。好吧我看不懂
